dict.string: This is a config.plist for "MSI Z590 Pro Wifi" CometLake by Cobanramo
OpenCore v0.7.8 Nightly Config for "Cometlake SMBIOS iMac20,2"

Delete Original DMA Remapping table (DMAR.aml Table)

Generic Card Reader Driver Friend (NUR USB CARDREADER)
Send panic string to serial port

OpenCore-configured UEFI Shell for compatibility with a broad range of firmwares.
Check CFG Lock (MSR 0xE2 write protection) consistency across all cores.
Enter Apple BootPicker menu (exclusive for Macs with compatible GPUs)
Test BeepGen protocol and generate audio signals of different style and length.
Reset NVRAM alternative bundled as a standalone tool.
Parse and dump High Definition Audio codec information (requires AudioDxe)
Test keyboard input in SimpleText mode.
Unlock and lock back NVRAM protection for other tools to be able to get full NVRAM access when launching from OpenCore.
Perform EPID provisioning (requires certificate data configuration). (Achtung, fehlt unter Tools)
Utility to read and write RTC (CMOS) memory.
Partition management driver with Apple Partitioning Scheme support.
Screenshot Driver (mit F10 Bildschirmfotos unter OC schiessen)

Fix black screen on wake from hibernation for Lenovo Thinkpad T490
